# Price Tag API - LLM Documentation

## OVERVIEW
The Price Tag API is a comprehensive REST API for creating, managing, and generating professional price tags with PDF export capabilities. Designed specifically for AI assistant integration with OpenAPI 3.0 support and function calling capabilities.

## BASE_URL
https://your-domain.com/api

## AUTHENTICATION
None required (currently open for testing)

## CONTENT_TYPE
application/json

## CORE_FUNCTIONS

### create_price_tag
Creates a single professional price tag
ENDPOINT: POST /api/price-tags
REQUIRED: data (string), price (integer in cents)
OPTIONAL: designType, hasDiscount, priceFor2, priceFrom3
EXAMPLE: {"data": "Coffee", "price": 1200, "designType": "new"}

### create_bulk_price_tags  
Creates multiple price tags in one request
ENDPOINT: POST /api/price-tags
REQUIRED: items (array of price tag objects, max 1000)
EXAMPLE: {"items": [{"data": "Item A", "price": 1000}, {"data": "Item B", "price": 1500}]}

### generate_pdf
Generates printable PDF from price tags
ENDPOINT: POST /api/generate-pdf-v2
REQUIRED: items (array of price tag data)
OPTIONAL: format (A4/A3/Letter), settings (design options)
RETURNS: PDF binary file for download

### list_price_tags
Retrieves price tags with filtering and pagination
ENDPOINT: GET /api/price-tags
OPTIONAL: page, limit, search, designType, minPrice, maxPrice, sortBy, sortOrder
RETURNS: Paginated list with navigation info

### get_price_tag
Gets specific price tag by ID
ENDPOINT: GET /api/price-tags/{id}
REQUIRED: id (integer)
RETURNS: Single price tag object

### update_price_tag
Updates existing price tag
ENDPOINT: PUT /api/price-tags/{id} 
REQUIRED: id (integer)
OPTIONAL: data, price, designType, hasDiscount, priceFor2, priceFrom3

### delete_price_tag
Removes price tag permanently
ENDPOINT: DELETE /api/price-tags/{id}
REQUIRED: id (integer)

### generate_html_preview
Creates HTML preview of price tags
ENDPOINT: POST /api/generate-html
REQUIRED: items (array of price tag data)
OPTIONAL: settings (design options)
RETURNS: HTML content for preview

### check_health
Returns API status and capabilities
ENDPOINT: GET /api/health
RETURNS: System health, endpoints, LLM integration info

## DESIGN_TYPES
Available themes: default, new, sale, white, black, sunset, ocean, forest, royal, vintage, neon, monochrome, silver, charcoal, paper, ink, snow

Theme usage:
- new: Shows "NEW" label for new products
- sale: Shows "SALE" label for discounted items
- default: Standard professional appearance
- Color themes provide branded appearance
- Minimal themes for clean design

## PRICING_STRUCTURE
All prices in smallest currency unit (cents for USD)
- price: Main product price
- discountPrice: Auto-calculated from discount settings
- priceFor2: Bulk price for 2 items
- priceFrom3: Bulk price for 3+ items

## RESPONSE_FORMAT
SUCCESS: {"success": true, "data": {...}, "message": "..."}
ERROR: {"success": false, "error": "error message"}
PAGINATED: {"success": true, "data": {"items": [...], "pagination": {...}}}

## COMMON_PATTERNS

Single price tag creation:
```
POST /api/price-tags
{"data": "Product Name", "price": 1200, "designType": "new"}
```

Bulk creation:
```
POST /api/price-tags  
{"items": [{"data": "A", "price": 1000}, {"data": "B", "price": 1500}]}
```

PDF generation:
```
POST /api/generate-pdf-v2
{"items": [...], "format": "A4", "settings": {"design": true}}
```

Search and filter:
```
GET /api/price-tags?search=coffee&designType=sale&page=1&limit=20
```

## ERROR_HANDLING
- 400: Validation errors (missing required fields, invalid values)
- 404: Resource not found (invalid price tag ID)
- 500: Server errors (system issues)

All errors include descriptive messages for debugging

## CAPABILITIES
- Create up to 1000 price tags per request
- Support 17 professional design themes
- Generate PDFs in A4, A3, Letter formats
- Multi-tier pricing with bulk discounts
- Full CRUD operations with filtering
- Real-time health monitoring
- HTML preview before PDF generation
